summary: An ambitious graduate student convinces a writer that her thesis can resurrect his career.
cast: Frank Langella|Lauren Ambrose|Patti Perkins|Lili Taylor|Adrian Lester|Dennis Parlato|Jeff McCarthy|Michael Cumpsty|Jessica Hecht|Karl Bury|Sean T. Krishnan|Thomas Ryan|Anitha Gandhi|Joie Lee|John C. Havens|Joel West|Ali Reza|Jerry Walsh|Denise S. Anderson|John Auer|Jackie Brown
title: Starting Out in the Evening
